User.task_description: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk bot. Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk bot has told you to do so.
linear_guide:
Imagine: Your name is Tony. You are on a train to some big city, and it occurs to you that you don't know how to get to your hotel. So you take out your phone and open your new AI assistant app. 

Say hello to your AI assistant!
Book a ride from the Central Station (this is where you are currently heading) to your hotel (Hilton in the center of town).

You just remember that last time you took a Lyft, the driver was a bit annoying. So when you book the ride, make sure your driver is not Mark. If you have already booked, request a change. If you are booking right now, ask if Mark is the driver and, if so, request another.

You get a text from the hotel. The waterline broke and unfortunately they cannot accommodate you tonight. Be creative! Perhaps your assistant can find another hotel in the center for you? You'll also have to change your ride...
When you look for accommodation, make sure that they offer room service. You don't have to book it. Just make sure you also change your ride to arrive at the new hotel.
You just arrived at the Central Station. Find out how far out your ride is (unless you've cancelled it).
Good! Bring the conversation to a natural end in the next few turns.
